name: Organic Banana
description: Bananas are rich in potassium and fiber. They may help with digestion and provide quick energy.

name: Red Apple
description: Apples are nutritious. Apples may be good for weight loss. Apples may be good for your heart. As part of a healthful and varied diet.

name: Green Grapes
description: Grapes are a good source of fiber, potassium, and a range of vitamins and other minerals.

name: Broccoli
description: Broccoli is high in many nutrients, including fiber, vitamin C, vitamin K, iron, and potassium.

name: beef Bone
description: Beef bones are a good source of minerals and collagen, often used for making broth.

name: Broller chicken
description: Broiler chicken is a good source of protein and essential vitamins and minerals.
